20101228062202.000|20101228062203.000|CC1|MANY CALORIES, WHICH IS WHY THE 
20101228062203.000|20101228062206.000|CC1|FOOD POLICE SAY WE NEED TO KNOW 
20101228062206.000|20101228062206.000|CC1|MORE.                           
20101228062206.000|20101228062207.000|CC1|CHAIN RESTAURANTS IN CALIFORNIA 
20101228062207.000|20101228062208.000|CC1|MUST POST CALORIE COUNTS ON     
20101228062208.000|20101228062209.000|CC1|THEIR MENU BEGINNING  JANUARY
